DOCNAME: CASE OF SHASTIN AND SHASTINA v. UKRAINE
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mykhaylo Buromenskiy;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE . The first applicant lives in GPE . The second applicant lived in the same town before his death .
CARDINAL . At the material time the applicants worked at ORG ( ВАТ « Содовий завод GPE ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the ORG awarded the first applicant PERSON and CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( ORG ) in salary arrears to be paid by the above - mentioned company .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE the ORG awarded the second applicant ORG MONEY CARDINAL in salary arrears to be paid by the above - mentioned company .
CARDINAL . These decisions became final and ORG instituted proceedings to enforce them .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( after DATE the Donetsk Regional Commercial Court ) instituted insolvency proceedings against the debtor company . On DATE the court , having declared the debtor insolvent , ordered its liquidation , which is still pending .
CARDINAL . The decisions given in the applicants ' favour have not been executed .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
